body:
I haven't done one of these in a long time due to certain incidents but I decided to continue on giving out puzzles to the community!
First off, the answer to WEEK #2:
1,276 days.
Now for this weeks puzzle (A shorter one)
ABCD × E = DCBA
(Replace letters with digits and have the sum be true. A,B,C,D and E are all different digits.)
Good luck!

title: Hoop's Weekly Puzzle (WEEK #3)

replies.body: I'll try to post one every Thursday! (Unless something happens preventing me from doing so)
